title: How Lamine Diack's 16-year reign in charge of IAAF led to a jail term | Lamine Diack | The Guardian
snippet: Diack’s corruption, covering up Russian doping cases for bribes, was discovered after police raided a Paris hotel ... The unmasking of Lamine Diack as one of the great sinners in the history of sport began with a police raid on All Saints’ ...

title: Lamine Diack - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2016, the World Anti-Doping Agency reported that with his influence, Diack was able to install two of his sons and a friend into positions that exerted influence over the IAAF. The report says that Lamine Diack "was responsible for organizing and enabling the conspiracy and corruption that took place in the IAAF."

title: Lamine Diack - latest news, breaking stories and comment - The Independent
snippet: The latest breaking news, comment and features from The Independent.

title: Lamine Diack found guilty of corruption and sentenced to two years in prison | Lamine Diack | The Guardian
snippet: The former IAAF president Lamine Diack and other senior athletics figures have been found guilty in France of corruption, including accepting bribes to help Russians cover up doping results

title: Lamine Diack: Disgraced athletics boss dies in Senegal - BBC Sport
snippet: Senegal's former World Athletics president Lamine Diack during his corruption trial in France in 2020
